text: Beloretsk () is a rural locality (a village) in Akberdinsky Selsoviet, Iglinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 46 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 71 km from Iglino, 16 km from Akberdino. == References == Category:Rural localities in Iglinsky District
title: Beloretsk, Iglinsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
